thread.title: Hindu mob kills Muslim over beef
thread.title_full: Hindu mob kills Muslim over beef | News24

author: news24.com
title: Hindu mob kills Muslim over beef
text:
New Delhi - A village mob in northern India beat one Muslim to death with sticks and injured four others who were accused of smuggling cows to be slaughtered for beef, police said on Friday.
The survivors were arrested for alleged animal cruelty.
Hard-line Hindus have been trying to force a national ban on cow slaughter, triggering mob violence. A Muslim man was lynched in Uttar Pradesh state last month over false rumours that his family had eaten beef for dinner.
Hindus worship cows as a sacred animal and some Indian states ban slaughtering them. The country of 1.3 billion is about 81% Hindu and 13% Muslim.
